GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: oss: Fix negative period/buffer sizes

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.165 by commit f12c8a7515f641885677960af450082569a87243. For more details please see the references link.
